cast.name: 斯塔克·桑德斯 Stark Sands

this_title: Stark - A True Texas Family Tale
introduction: 'Behind every great fortune is a great crime'.... In the graves and mausoleums of Evergreen Cemetery in Orange, Texas lie secrets to the theft of one the greatest fortunes ever accumulated by one family... the Stark family.... Ironically, today much of the family's fortune still exists... and it's still in Orange... but under the control of a non-profit foundation bearing the Stark family name, yet there are no Starks involved. This Texas sized story of greed, power, corruption and murder is so unbelievable it would be impossible to make it up... 'Stark' A True Texas Family Tale, exposes the truth... the real history of the Stark family, as told by the Stark family.由 Stark 家族成员讲述的 Stark 家族故事，旁白 Stark Sands。
chinese_title: Stark - A True Texas Family Tale
